education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Business

work.title: Software Engineer II
description: Develop and write code across the full stack for Pinnacle 21, a SaaS product in the drug development process, leveraging strong communication skills to collaborate effectively with engineers, product owners, and testers to ensure seamless project execution and delivery.

Contributed to the interview team for software engineering and intern candidates, conducting both behavioral and technical assessments to evaluate skills, cultural fit, and potential contributions to the team.

work.title: Software Engineer I
description: Advised four student interns as a technical lead: guided them through the software development lifecycle, provided feedback on pull requests, and served as their first point of contact for any questions or concerns.
Debugged a slow database query by examining the execution plan and identifying a bottleneck in one of the views, optimizing the performance by up to 50%.

Identified and resolved a critical security vulnerability that had successfully bypassed previous penetration testing, enhancing the overall security of the application and safeguarding sensitive user data.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed a website using the MeteorJS framework for partners and employees to manage and update over 5,000 products for the content website receiving 385k unique visitors and 500k page views each month.
Implemented the user interface (UI) based on styles from the content website.
Wrote test scripts to validate releases. Upon confirming the code, it was pushed to production using scripts from MeteorJS, which created docker images.
